A Disney official said Wednesday the company plans to "thoroughly review" its alligator warning signage around a resort where a    boy was killed by a reptile that snatched him out of shallow water.
Caption   The body of a    boy snatched by an alligator has been found, officials in Florida said, after a search around a Disney resort that lasted more than 18 hours.

Lake Buena Vista, Florida (CNN) Alligator warning signs will be put up near all the waterways at Walt Disney World resorts following the death of a    boy who was dragged into a lagoon two nights ago, a senior source at Disney told CNN on Thursday.
